card.name: Abuna Acolyte
card.rules-text: {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn. {T}: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target artifact creature this turn.

card.name: Arrest
card.rules-text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.

card.name: Auriok Edgewright
card.rules-text: Metalcraft - Auriok Edgewright has double strike as long as you control three or more artifacts.

card.name: Auriok Sunchaser
card.rules-text: Metalcraft - As long as you control three or more artifacts, Auriok Sunchaser gets +2/+2 and has flying.

card.name: Dispense Justice
card.rules-text: Target player sacrifices an attacking creature. Metalcraft - That player sacrifices two attacking creatures instead if you control three or more artifacts.

card.name: Elspeth Tirel
card.rules-text: +2: You gain 1 life for each creature you control. -2: Put three 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens onto the battlefield. -5: Destroy all other permanents except for lands and tokens.

card.name: Fulgent Distraction
card.rules-text: Choose two target creatures. Tap those creatures, then unattach all Equipment from them.

card.name: Ghalma's Warden
card.rules-text: Metalcraft - Ghalma's Warden gets +2/+2 as long as you control three or more artifacts.

card.name: Glimmerpoint Stag
card.rules-text: Vigilance When Glimmerpoint Stag enters the battlefield, exile another target permanent. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Glint Hawk
card.rules-text: Flying When Glint Hawk enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you return an artifact you control to its owner's hand.

card.name: Indomitable Archangel
card.rules-text: Flying Metalcraft - Artifacts you control have shroud as long as you control three or more artifacts.

card.name: Kemba, Kha Regent
card.rules-text: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a 2/2 white Cat creature token onto the battlefield for each Equipment attached to Kemba, Kha Regent.

card.name: Kemba's Skyguard
card.rules-text: Flying When Kemba's Skyguard enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.

card.name: Leonin Arbiter
card.rules-text: Players can't search libraries. Any player may pay {2} for that player to ignore this effect until end of turn.

card.name: Myrsmith
card.rules-text: Whenever you cast an artifact spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, put a 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature token onto the battlefield.

card.name: Razor Hippogriff
card.rules-text: Flying When Razor Hippogriff enters the battlefield, return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand. You gain life equal to that card's converted mana cost.

card.name: Revoke Existence
card.rules-text: Exile target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Salvage Scout
card.rules-text: {W}, Sacrifice Salvage Scout: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Seize the Initiative
card.rules-text: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Soul Parry
card.rules-text: Prevent all damage one or two target creatures would deal this turn.

card.name: Sunblast Angel
card.rules-text: Flying When Sunblast Angel enters the battlefield, destroy all tapped creatures.

card.name: Sunspear Shikari
card.rules-text: As long as Sunspear Shikari is equipped, it has first strike and lifelink.

card.name: Tempered Steel
card.rules-text: Artifact creatures you control get +2/+2.

card.name: True Conviction
card.rules-text: Creatures you control have double strike and lifelink.

card.name: Vigil for the Lost
card.rules-text: Whenever a creature you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {X}. If you do, you gain X life.

card.name: Whitesun's Passage
card.rules-text: You gain 5 life.

card.name: Argent Sphinx
card.rules-text: Flying Metalcraft - {U}: Exile Argent Sphinx. Return it to the battlefield under your control at the beginning of the next end step. Activate this ability only if you control three or more artifacts.

card.name: Bonds of Quicksilver
card.rules-text: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Enchant creature Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

card.name: Darkslick Drake
card.rules-text: Flying When Darkslick Drake is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.

card.name: Disperse
card.rules-text: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.

card.name: Dissipation Field
card.rules-text: Whenever a permanent deals damage to you, return it to its owner's hand.

card.name: Grand Architect
card.rules-text: Other blue creatures you control get +1/+1. {U}: Target artifact creature becomes blue until end of turn. Tap an untapped blue creature you control: Add {2} to your mana pool. Spend this mana only to cast artifact spells or activate abilities of artifacts.

card.name: Halt Order
card.rules-text: Counter target artifact spell. Draw a card.

card.name: Inexorable Tide
card.rules-text: Whenever you cast a spell, proliferate. (You choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of a kind already there.)

card.name: Lumengrid Drake
card.rules-text: Flying Metalcraft - When Lumengrid Drake enters the battlefield, if you control three or more artifacts, return target creature to its owner's hand.

card.name: Neurok Invisimancer
card.rules-text: Neurok Invisimancer is unblockable. When Neurok Invisimancer enters the battlefield, target creature is unblockable this turn.

card.name: Quicksilver Gargantuan
card.rules-text: You may have Quicksilver Gargantuan enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield, except it's still 7/7.

card.name: Riddlesmith
card.rules-text: Whenever you cast an artifact spell, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.

card.name: Scrapdiver Serpent
card.rules-text: Scrapdiver Serpent is unblockable as long as defending player controls an artifact.

card.name: Screeching Silcaw
card.rules-text: Flying Metalcraft - Whenever Screeching Silcaw deals combat damage to a player, if you control three or more artifacts, that player puts the top four cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

card.name: Shape Anew
card.rules-text: The controller of target artifact sacrifices it, then reveals cards from the top of his or her library until he or she reveals an artifact card. That player puts that card onto the battlefield, then shuffles all other cards revealed this way into his or her library.

card.name: Sky-Eel School
card.rules-text: Flying When Sky-Eel School enters the battlefield, draw a card, then discard a card.

card.name: Steady Progress
card.rules-text: Proliferate. (You choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of a kind already there.) Draw a card.

card.name: Stoic Rebuttal
card.rules-text: Metalcraft - Stoic Rebuttal costs {1} less to cast if you control three or more artifacts. Counter target spell.

card.name: Thrummingbird
card.rules-text: Flying Whenever Thrummingbird deals combat damage to a player, proliferate. (You choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of a kind already there.)

card.name: Trinket Mage
card.rules-text: When Trinket Mage enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an artifact card with converted mana cost 1 or less, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

card.name: Turn Aside
card.rules-text: Counter target spell that targets a permanent you control.

card.name: Twisted Image
card.rules-text: Switch target creature's power and toughness until end of turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Vault Skyward
card.rules-text: Target creature gains flying until end of turn. Untap it.

card.name: Vedalken Certarch
card.rules-text: Metalcraft - {T}: Tap target artifact, creature, or land. Activate this ability only if you control three or more artifacts.

card.name: Volition Reins
card.rules-text: Enchant permanent When Volition Reins enters the battlefield, if enchanted permanent is tapped, untap it. You control enchanted permanent.

card.name: Blackcleave Goblin
card.rules-text: Haste Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

card.name: Bleak Coven Vampires
card.rules-text: Metalcraft - When Bleak Coven Vampires enters the battlefield, if you control three or more artifacts, target player loses 4 life and you gain 4 life.

card.name: Blistergrub
card.rules-text: Swampwalk When Blistergrub is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, each opponent loses 2 life.

card.name: Carnifex Demon
card.rules-text: Flying Carnifex Demon enters the battlefield with two -1/-1 counters on it. {B}, Remove a -1/-1 counter from Carnifex Demon: Put a -1/-1 counter on each other creature.

card.name: Contagious Nim
card.rules-text: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

card.name: Corrupted Harvester
card.rules-text: {B}, Sacrifice a creature: Regenerate Corrupted Harvester.

card.name: Dross Hopper
card.rules-text: Sacrifice a creature: Dross Hopper gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Exsanguinate
card.rules-text: Each opponent loses X life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.

card.name: Flesh Allergy
card.rules-text: As an additional cost to cast Flesh Allergy, sacrifice a creature. Destroy target creature. Its controller loses life equal to the number of creatures put into all graveyards from the battlefield this turn.

card.name: Fume Spitter
card.rules-text: Sacrifice Fume Spitter: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.

card.name: Geth, Lord of the Vault
card.rules-text: Intimidate {X}{B}: Put target artifact or creature card with converted mana cost X from an opponent's graveyard onto the battlefield under your control tapped. Then that player puts the top X cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

card.name: Grasp of Darkness
card.rules-text: Target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn.

card.name: Hand of the Praetors
card.rules-text: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.) Other creatures you control with infect get +1/+1. Whenever you cast a creature spell with infect, target player gets a poison counter.

card.name: Ichor Rats
card.rules-text: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.) When Ichor Rats enters the battlefield, each player gets a poison counter.

card.name: Instill Infection
card.rules-text: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature. Draw a card.

card.name: Memoricide
card.rules-text: Name a nonland card. Search target player's graveyard, hand, and library for any number of cards with that name and exile them. Then that player shuffles his or her library.

card.name: Necrogen Scudder
card.rules-text: Flying When Necrogen Scudder enters the battlefield, you lose 3 life.

card.name: Necrotic Ooze
card.rules-text: As long as Necrotic Ooze is on the battlefield, it has all activated abilities of all creature cards in all graveyards.

card.name: Painsmith
card.rules-text: Whenever you cast an artifact spell, you may have target creature get +2/+0 and gain deathtouch until end of turn.

card.name: Painful Quandary
card.rules-text: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, that player loses 5 life unless he or she discards a card.

card.name: Plague Stinger
card.rules-text: Flying Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

card.name: Psychic Miasma
card.rules-text: Target player discards a card. If a land card is discarded this way, return Psychic Miasma to its owner's hand.

card.name: Relic Putrescence
card.rules-text: Enchant artifact Whenever enchanted artifact becomes tapped, its controller gets a poison counter.

card.name: Skinrender
card.rules-text: When Skinrender enters the battlefield, put three -1/-1 counters on target creature.

card.name: Skithiryx, the Blight Dragon
card.rules-text: Flying Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.) {B}: Skithiryx, the Blight Dragon gains haste until end of turn. {B}{B}: Regenerate Skithiryx.

card.name: Tainted Strike
card.rules-text: Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains infect until end of turn. (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

card.name: Arc Trail
card.rules-text: Arc Trail deals 2 damage to target creature or player and 1 damage to another target creature or player.

card.name: Assault Strobe
card.rules-text: Target creature gains double strike until end of turn. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)

card.name: Barrage Ogre
card.rules-text: {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Barrage Ogre deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Blade-Tribe Berserkers
card.rules-text: Metalcraft - When Blade-Tribe Berserkers enters the battlefield, if you control three or more artifacts, Blade-Tribe Berserkers gets +3/+3 and gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Bloodshot Trainee
card.rules-text: {T}: Bloodshot Trainee deals 4 damage to target creature. Activate this ability only if Bloodshot Trainee's power is 4 or greater.

card.name: Cerebral Eruption
card.rules-text: Target opponent reveals the top card of his or her library. Cerebral Eruption deals damage equal to the revealed card's converted mana cost to that player and each creature he or she controls. If a land card is revealed this way, return Cerebral Eruption to its owner's hand.

card.name: Embersmith
card.rules-text: Whenever you cast an artifact spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, Embersmith deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Ferrovore
card.rules-text: {R}, Sacrifice an artifact: Ferrovore gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Flameborn Hellion
card.rules-text: Haste Flameborn Hellion attacks each turn if able.

card.name: Furnace Celebration
card.rules-text: Whenever you sacrifice another permanent, you may pay {2}. If you do, Furnace Celebration deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Galvanic Blast
card.rules-text: Galvanic Blast deals 2 damage to target creature or player. Metalcraft - Galvanic Blast deals 4 damage to that creature or player instead if you control three or more artifacts.

card.name: Goblin Gaveleer
card.rules-text: Trample Goblin Gaveleer gets +2/+0 for each Equipment attached to it.

card.name: Hoard-Smelter Dragon
card.rules-text: Flying {3}{R}: Destroy target artifact. Hoard-Smelter Dragon gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is that artifact's converted mana cost.

card.name: Koth of the Hammer
card.rules-text: +1: Untap target Mountain. It becomes a 4/4 red Elemental creature until end of turn. It's still a land. -2: Add {R} to your mana pool for each Mountain you control. -5: You get an emblem with "Mountains you control have '{T}: This land deals 1 damage to target creature or player.'"

card.name: Kuldotha Phoenix
card.rules-text: Flying, haste Metalcraft - {4}: Return Kuldotha Phoenix from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate this ability only during your upkeep and only if you control three or more artifacts.

card.name: Kuldotha Rebirth
card.rules-text: As an additional cost to cast Kuldotha Rebirth, sacrifice an artifact. Put three 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens onto the battlefield.

card.name: Melt Terrain
card.rules-text: Destroy target land. Melt Terrain deals 2 damage to that land's controller.

card.name: Molten Psyche
card.rules-text: Each player shuffles the cards from his or her hand into his or her library, then draws that many cards. Metalcraft - If you control three or more artifacts, Molten Psyche deals damage to each opponent equal to the number of cards that player has drawn this turn.

card.name: Ogre Geargrabber
card.rules-text: Whenever Ogre Geargrabber attacks, gain control of target Equipment an opponent controls until end of turn. Attach it to Ogre Geargrabber. When you lose control of that Equipment, unattach it.

card.name: Oxidda Daredevil
card.rules-text: Sacrifice an artifact: Oxidda Daredevil gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Oxidda Scrapmelter
card.rules-text: When Oxidda Scrapmelter enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact.

card.name: Shatter
card.rules-text: Destroy target artifact.

card.name: Spikeshot Elder
card.rules-text: {1}{R}{R}: Spikeshot Elder deals damage equal to its power to target creature or player.

card.name: Tunnel Ignus
card.rules-text: Whenever a land enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, if that player had another land enter the battlefield under his or her control this turn, Tunnel Ignus deals 3 damage to that player.

card.name: Turn to Slag
card.rules-text: Turn to Slag deals 5 damage to target creature. Destroy all Equipment attached to that creature.

card.name: Vulshok Heartstoker
card.rules-text: When Vulshok Heartstoker enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Acid Web Spider
card.rules-text: Reach When Acid Web Spider enters the battlefield, you may destroy target Equipment.

card.name: Asceticism
card.rules-text: Creatures you control can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control. {1}{G}: Regenerate target creature.

card.name: Bellowing Tanglewurm
card.rules-text: Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.) Other green creatures you control have intimidate.

card.name: Blight Mamba
card.rules-text: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.) {1}{G}: Regenerate Blight Mamba.

card.name: Blunt the Assault
card.rules-text: You gain 1 life for each creature on the battlefield. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

card.name: Carapace Forger
card.rules-text: Metalcraft - Carapace Forger gets +2/+2 as long as you control three or more artifacts.

card.name: Carrion Call
card.rules-text: Put two 1/1 green Insect creature tokens with infect onto the battlefield. (They deal damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

card.name: Copperhorn Scout
card.rules-text: Whenever Copperhorn Scout attacks, untap each other creature you control.

card.name: Cystbearer
card.rules-text: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

card.name: Engulfing Slagwurm
card.rules-text: Whenever Engulfing Slagwurm blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, destroy that creature. You gain life equal to that creature's toughness.

card.name: Ezuri, Renegade Leader
card.rules-text: {G}: Regenerate another target Elf. {2}{G}{G}{G}: Elf creatures you control get +3/+3 and gain trample until end of turn.

card.name: Ezuri's Archers
card.rules-text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) Whenever Ezuri's Archers blocks a creature with flying, Ezuri's Archers gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Ezuri's Brigade
card.rules-text: Metalcraft - As long as you control three or more artifacts, Ezuri's Brigade gets +4/+4 and has trample.

card.name: Genesis Wave
card.rules-text: Reveal the top X cards of your library. You may put any number of permanent cards with converted mana cost X or less from among them onto the battlefield. Then put all cards revealed this way that weren't put onto the battlefield into your graveyard.

card.name: Liege of the Tangle
card.rules-text: Trample Whenever Liege of the Tangle deals combat damage to a player, you may choose any number of target lands you control and put an awakening counter on each of them. Each of those lands is an 8/8 green Elemental creature for as long as it has an awakening counter on it. They're still lands.

card.name: Lifesmith
card.rules-text: Whenever you cast an artifact spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 3 life.

card.name: Molder Beast
card.rules-text: Trample Whenever an artifact is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, Molder Beast gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Putrefax
card.rules-text: Trample, haste Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.) At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Putrefax.

card.name: Slice in Twain
card.rules-text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Draw a card.

card.name: Tangle Angler
card.rules-text: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.) {G}: Target creature blocks Tangle Angler this turn if able.

card.name: Tel-Jilad Defiance
card.rules-text: Target creature gains protection from artifacts until end of turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Tel-Jilad Fallen
card.rules-text: Protection from artifacts Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

card.name: Untamed Might
card.rules-text: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn.

card.name: Viridian Revel
card.rules-text: Whenever an artifact is put into an opponent's graveyard from the battlefield, you may draw a card.

card.name: Wing Puncture
card.rules-text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature with flying.

card.name: Withstand Death
card.rules-text: Target creature is indestructible this turn. (Lethal damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it. If its toughness is 0 or less, it's still put into its owner's graveyard.)

card.name: Venser, the Sojourner
card.rules-text: +2: Exile target permanent you own. Return it to the battlefield under your control at the beginning of the next end step. -1: Creatures are unblockable this turn. -8: You get an emblem with "Whenever you cast a spell, exile target permanent."

card.name: Accorder's Shield
card.rules-text: Equipped creature gets +0/+3 and has vigilance. Equip {3}

card.name: Argentum Armor
card.rules-text: Equipped creature gets +6/+6. Whenever equipped creature attacks, destroy target permanent. Equip {6}

card.name: Auriok Replica
card.rules-text: {W}, Sacrifice Auriok Replica: Prevent all damage a source of your choice would deal to you this turn.

card.name: Barbed Battlegear
card.rules-text: Equipped creature gets +4/-1. Equip {2}

card.name: Bladed Pinions
card.rules-text: Equipped creature has flying and first strike. Equip {2}

card.name: Chimeric Mass
card.rules-text: Chimeric Mass enters the battlefield with X charge counters on it. {1}: Until end of turn, Chimeric Mass becomes a Construct artifact creature with "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of charge counters on it."

card.name: Chrome Steed
card.rules-text: Metalcraft - Chrome Steed gets +2/+2 as long as you control three or more artifacts.

card.name: Clone Shell
card.rules-text: Imprint - When Clone Shell enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library, exile one face down, then put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. When Clone Shell is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, turn the exiled card face up. If it's a creature card, put it onto the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Contagion Clasp
card.rules-text: When Contagion Clasp enters the battlefield, put a -1/-1 counter on target creature. {4}, {T}: Proliferate. (You choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of a kind already there.)

card.name: Contagion Engine
card.rules-text: When Contagion Engine enters the battlefield, put a -1/-1 counter on each creature target player controls. {4}, {T}: Proliferate, then proliferate again. (You choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of a kind already there. Then do it again.)

card.name: Copper Myr
card.rules-text: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.

card.name: Corpse Cur
card.rules-text: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.) When Corpse Cur enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card with infect from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Culling Dais
card.rules-text: {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Put a charge counter on Culling Dais. {1}, Sacrifice Culling Dais: Draw a card for each charge counter on Culling Dais.

card.name: Darksteel Axe
card.rules-text: Darksteel Axe is indestructible. (Effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.) Equipped creature gets +2/+0. Equip {2}

card.name: Darksteel Juggernaut
card.rules-text: Darksteel Juggernaut's power and toughness are each equal to the number of artifacts you control. Darksteel Juggernaut is indestructible and attacks each turn if able.

card.name: Darksteel Myr
card.rules-text: Darksteel Myr is indestructible. (Lethal damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it. If its toughness is 0 or less, it's still put into its owner's graveyard.)

card.name: Darksteel Sentinel
card.rules-text: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Vigilance Darksteel Sentinel is indestructible. (Lethal damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it. If its toughness is 0 or less, it's still put into its owner's graveyard.)

card.name: Echo Circlet
card.rules-text: Equipped creature can block an additional creature. Equip {1}

card.name: Etched Champion
card.rules-text: Metalcraft - Etched Champion has protection from all colors as long as you control three or more artifacts.

card.name: Flight Spellbomb
card.rules-text: {T}, Sacrifice Flight Spellbomb: Target creature gains flying until end of turn. When Flight Spellbomb is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {U}. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Glint Hawk Idol
card.rules-text: Whenever another artifact enters the battlefield under your control, you may have Glint Hawk Idol become a 2/2 Bird artifact creature with flying until end of turn. {W}: Glint Hawk Idol becomes a 2/2 Bird artifact creature with flying until end of turn.

card.name: Gold Myr
card.rules-text: {T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.

card.name: Golden Urn
card.rules-text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a charge counter on Golden Urn. {T}, Sacrifice Golden Urn: You gain life equal to the number of charge counters on Golden Urn.

card.name: Golem Artisan
card.rules-text: {2}: Target artifact creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. {2}: Target artifact creature gains your choice of flying, trample, or haste until end of turn.

card.name: Golem Foundry
card.rules-text: Whenever you cast an artifact spell, you may put a charge counter on Golem Foundry. Remove three charge counters from Golem Foundry: Put a 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature token onto the battlefield.

card.name: Golem's Heart
card.rules-text: Whenever a player casts an artifact spell, you may gain 1 life.

card.name: Grafted Exoskeleton
card.rules-text: Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has infect. (It deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.) Whenever Grafted Exoskeleton becomes unattached from a permanent, sacrifice that permanent. Equip {2}

card.name: Grindclock
card.rules-text: {T}: Put a charge counter on Grindclock. {T}: Target player puts the top X cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard, where X is the number of charge counters on Grindclock.

card.name: Heavy Arbalest
card.rules-text: Equipped creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step. Equipped creature has "{T}: This creature deals 2 damage to target creature or player." Equip {4}

card.name: Horizon Spellbomb
card.rules-text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Horizon Spellbomb: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library. When Horizon Spellbomb is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {G}. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Ichorclaw Myr
card.rules-text: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.) Whenever Ichorclaw Myr becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Infiltration Lens
card.rules-text: Whenever equipped creature becomes blocked by a creature, you may draw two cards. Equip {1}

card.name: Iron Myr
card.rules-text: {T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.

card.name: Kuldotha Forgemaster
card.rules-text: {T}, Sacrifice three artifacts: Search your library for an artifact card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Leaden Myr
card.rules-text: {T}: Add {B} to your mana pool.

card.name: Liquimetal Coating
card.rules-text: {T}: Target permanent becomes an artifact in addition to its other types until end of turn.

card.name: Livewire Lash
card.rules-text: Equipped creature gets +2/+0 and has "Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell, this creature deals 2 damage to target creature or player." Equip {2}

card.name: Lux Cannon
card.rules-text: {T}: Put a charge counter on Lux Cannon. {T}, Remove three charge counters from Lux Cannon: Destroy target permanent.

card.name: Mimic Vat
card.rules-text: Imprint - Whenever a nontoken creature is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may exile that card. If you do, return each other card exiled with Mimic Vat to its owner's graveyard. {3}, {T}: Put a token onto the battlefield that's a copy of the exiled card. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Mindslaver
card.rules-text: {4}, {T}, Sacrifice Mindslaver: You control target player during that player's next turn. (You see all cards that player could see and make all decisions for the player.)

card.name: Molten-Tail Masticore
card.rules-text: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Molten-Tail Masticore unless you discard a card. {4}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Molten-Tail Masticore deals 4 damage to target creature or player. {2}: Regenerate Molten-Tail Masticore.

card.name: Moriok Replica
card.rules-text: {1}{B}, Sacrifice Moriok Replica: You draw two cards and lose 2 life.

card.name: Mox Opal
card.rules-text: Metalcraft - {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. Activate this ability only if you control three or more artifacts.

card.name: Myr Battlesphere
card.rules-text: When Myr Battlesphere enters the battlefield, put four 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature tokens onto the battlefield. Whenever Myr Battlesphere attacks, you may tap X untapped Myr you control. If you do, Myr Battlesphere gets +X/+0 until end of turn and deals X damage to defending player.

card.name: Myr Galvanizer
card.rules-text: Other Myr creatures you control get +1/+1. {1}, {T}: Untap each other Myr you control.

card.name: Myr Propagator
card.rules-text: {3}, {T}: Put a token that's a copy of Myr Propagator onto the battlefield.

card.name: Myr Reservoir
card.rules-text: {T}: Add {2} to your mana pool. Spend this mana only to cast Myr spells or activate abilities of Myr. {3}, {T}: Return target Myr card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Necrogen Censer
card.rules-text: Necrogen Censer enters the battlefield with two charge counters on it. {T}, Remove a charge counter from Necrogen Censer: Target player loses 2 life.

card.name: Necropede
card.rules-text: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.) When Necropede is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.

card.name: Neurok Replica
card.rules-text: {1}{U}, Sacrifice Neurok Replica: Return target creature to its owner's hand.

card.name: Nihil Spellbomb
card.rules-text: {T}, Sacrifice Nihil Spellbomb: Exile all cards from target player's graveyard. When Nihil Spellbomb is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {B}. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Nim Deathmantle
card.rules-text: Equipped creature gets +2/+2, has intimidate, and is a black Zombie. Whenever a nontoken creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {4}. If you do, return that card to the battlefield and attach Nim Deathmantle to it. Equip {4}

card.name: Origin Spellbomb
card.rules-text: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Origin Spellbomb: Put a 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature token onto the battlefield. When Origin Spellbomb is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {W}. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Palladium Myr
card.rules-text: {T}: Add {2} to your mana pool.

card.name: Panic Spellbomb
card.rules-text: {T}, Sacrifice Panic Spellbomb: Target creature can't block this turn. When Panic Spellbomb is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {R}. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Perilous Myr
card.rules-text: When Perilous Myr is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Platinum Emperion
card.rules-text: Your life total can't change. (You can't gain or lose life. You can't pay any amount of life except 0.)

card.name: Precursor Golem
card.rules-text: When Precursor Golem enters the battlefield, put two 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature tokens onto the battlefield. Whenever a player casts an instant or sorcery spell that targets only a single Golem, that player copies that spell for each other Golem that spell could target. Each copy targets a different one of those Golems.

card.name: Prototype Portal
card.rules-text: Imprint - When Prototype Portal enters the battlefield, you may exile an artifact card from your hand. {X}, {T}: Put a token that's a copy of the exiled card onto the battlefield. X is the converted mana cost of that card.

card.name: Ratchet Bomb
card.rules-text: {T}: Put a charge counter on Ratchet Bomb. {T}, Sacrifice Ratchet Bomb: Destroy each nonland permanent with converted mana cost equal to the number of charge counters on Ratchet Bomb.

card.name: Rust Tick
card.rules-text: You may choose not to untap Rust Tick during your untap step. {1}, {T}: Tap target artifact. It doesn't untap during its controller's untap step for as long as Rust Tick remains tapped.

card.name: Rusted Relic
card.rules-text: Metalcraft - Rusted Relic is a 5/5 Golem artifact creature as long as you control three or more artifacts.

card.name: Saberclaw Golem
card.rules-text: {R}: Saberclaw Golem gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Semblance Anvil
card.rules-text: Imprint - When Semblance Anvil enters the battlefield, you may exile a nonland card from your hand. Spells you cast that share a card type with the exiled card cost {2} less to cast.

card.name: Silver Myr
card.rules-text: {T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.

card.name: Snapsail Glider
card.rules-text: Metalcraft - Snapsail Glider has flying as long as you control three or more artifacts.

card.name: Soliton
card.rules-text: {U}: Untap Soliton.

card.name: Steel Hellkite
card.rules-text: Flying {2}: Steel Hellkite gets +1/+0 until end of turn. {X}: Destroy each nonland permanent with converted mana cost X whose controller was dealt combat damage by Steel Hellkite this turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.

card.name: Strata Scythe
card.rules-text: Imprint - When Strata Scythe enters the battlefield, search your library for a land card, exile it, then shuffle your library. Equipped creature gets +1/+1 for each land on the battlefield with the same name as the exiled card. Equip {3}

card.name: Strider Harness
card.rules-text: Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and has haste. Equip {1}

card.name: Sword of Body and Mind
card.rules-text: Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has protection from green and from blue. Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, you put a 2/2 green Wolf creature token onto the battlefield and that player puts the top ten cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard. Equip {2}

card.name: Sylvok Lifestaff
card.rules-text: Equipped creature gets +1/+0. Whenever equipped creature is put into a graveyard, you gain 3 life. Equip {1}

card.name: Sylvok Replica
card.rules-text: {G}, Sacrifice Sylvok Replica: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Throne of Geth
card.rules-text: {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Proliferate. (You choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of a kind already there.)

card.name: Tower of Calamities
card.rules-text: {8}, {T}: Tower of Calamities deals 12 damage to target creature.

card.name: Trigon of Corruption
card.rules-text: Trigon of Corruption enters the battlefield with three charge counters on it. {B}{B}, {T}: Put a charge counter on Trigon of Corruption. {2}, {T}, Remove a charge counter from Trigon of Corruption: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.

card.name: Trigon of Infestation
card.rules-text: Trigon of Infestation enters the battlefield with three charge counters on it. {G}{G}, {T}: Put a charge counter on Trigon of Infestation. {2}, {T}, Remove a charge counter from Trigon of Infestation: Put a 1/1 green Insect creature token with infect onto the battlefield.

card.name: Trigon of Mending
card.rules-text: Trigon of Mending enters the battlefield with three charge counters on it. {W}{W}, {T}: Put a charge counter on Trigon of Mending. {2}, {T}, Remove a charge counter from Trigon of Mending: Target player gains 3 life.

card.name: Trigon of Rage
card.rules-text: Trigon of Rage enters the battlefield with three charge counters on it. {R}{R}, {T}: Put a charge counter on Trigon of Rage. {2}, {T}, Remove a charge counter from Trigon of Rage: Target creature gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Trigon of Thought
card.rules-text: Trigon of Thought enters the battlefield with three charge counters on it. {U}{U}, {T}: Put a charge counter on Trigon of Thought. {2}, {T}, Remove a charge counter from Trigon of Thought: Draw a card.

card.name: Tumble Magnet
card.rules-text: Tumble Magnet enters the battlefield with three charge counters on it. {T}, Remove a charge counter from Tumble Magnet: Tap target artifact or creature.

card.name: Vector Asp
card.rules-text: {B}: Vector Asp gains infect until end of turn. (It deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

card.name: Venser's Journal
card.rules-text: You have no maximum hand size. At the beginning of your upkeep, you gain 1 life for each card in your hand.

card.name: Vulshok Replica
card.rules-text: {1}{R}, Sacrifice Vulshok Replica: Vulshok Replica deals 3 damage to target player.

card.name: Wall of Tanglecord
card.rules-text: Defender {G}: Wall of Tanglecord gains reach until end of turn. (It can block creatures with flying.)

card.name: Wurmcoil Engine
card.rules-text: Deathtouch, lifelink When Wurmcoil Engine is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, put a 3/3 colorless Wurm artifact creature token with deathtouch and a 3/3 colorless Wurm artifact creature token with lifelink onto the battlefield.

card.name: Blackcleave Cliffs
card.rules-text: Blackcleave Cliffs enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or fewer other lands. {T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool.

card.name: Copperline Gorge
card.rules-text: Copperline Gorge enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or fewer other lands. {T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool.

card.name: Darkslick Shores
card.rules-text: Darkslick Shores enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or fewer other lands. {T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool.

card.name: Glimmerpost
card.rules-text: When Glimmerpost enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life for each Locus on the battlefield. {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.

card.name: Razorverge Thicket
card.rules-text: Razorverge Thicket enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or fewer other lands. {T}: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool.

card.name: Seachrome Coast
card.rules-text: Seachrome Coast enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or fewer other lands. {T}: Add {W} or {U} to your mana pool.

card.name: Plains
card.rules-text: W

card.name: Island
card.rules-text: U

card.name: Swamp
card.rules-text: B

card.name: Mountain
card.rules-text: R

card.name: Forest
card.rules-text: G
